author: mbenson
msg: make this work even when my cygwin-based svn checks out files in \n but my JVM thinks line.separator = \r\n

author: geirm
msg: This patch fixes the following SingleStep bugs:
- Breakpoint was set for a wrong frame for regular bytecodes. The previous frame should be used only for return type
- Bug with uninitialized disassembler field in breakpoints when no other breakpoint is set in the place where
SingleStep breakpoint is going to be created
- Fixed exception RAISE state in breakpoints handler and exception event callback
- Fixed race condition when instrumenting compiled method
The patch also adds a lot of tracing useful for debugging SingleStep code.
Tested on Ubuntu 6.  smoke and c-unit pass.  kernel seemd to be usual mix of success and failure
